## IsEmptyTypeArray type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type IsEmptyTypeArray<T extends readonly unknown[]> = T extends T
  ? IsExtends<T['length'], 0>
  : never
```
<b>References:</b> [IsExtends](./types-kit.isextends.md)

## Example


```ts
// Expect: true
type Foo = IsEmptyTypeArray<[]>
```
